minerinfo.total_hash: tail -100 ${NVOC}/nvoc_logs/screenlog.0 | grep -o "Total [0-9]*.[0-9]*" | awk '{print $2}' | awk '{s+=$1} END {printf "%.2f", s}'
minerinfo.hash_count: tail -100 ${NVOC}/nvoc_logs/screenlog.0 | grep -o "Total [0-9]*" | awk '{print $2}' | grep -v grep | wc -l | awk '{print $1}'
